mc.job_engines package¶

The job_engines package contains classes and utilities for running jobs.

Subpackages¶

  • mc.job_engines.submission_builders package
    • Submodules
    • mc.job_engines.submission_builders.bash module
    • mc.job_engines.submission_builders.slurm module

Abstract Base Class for JobSubmissionRunners

generate_tmp_dir(prefix=None, suffix=None)[source]¶

Generate tmp dir in scratch dir, per submission_meta[‘scratch’]

If submission_meta[‘scratch’] is empty, creates a dir in submission_meta[‘dir’].

Parameters:submission_meta (dict) – dict of submission metadata, including job and cfg.
Returns:path to created dir.
Return type:tmp_dir <str>

Move a path to the submission outputs dir.

Parameters:

  • <str> – relative path under outputs dir to use as move target.
